website_summaries.verdict: You can use this convertible vinyl purse as a tote, or attach the cross-body strap for a hands-free messenger bag option.
pros: Clear bag made of 0.4-millimeter vinyl with top zipper and canvas-style flap
Thick and durable, but not inflexible
Holds items such as a water bottle, keys, cell phone, hat, sunglasses, and more
Removable cross-body strap adjusts from 30 to 60 inches
Can even fit a full size football in for autographs
cons: Plastic may crack, especially in colder temperatures

website_summaries.verdict: This roomy and clear tote bag is perfect for sporting events or travel to hold everything you need and to wear with comfort.
pros: Has 2 regular straps plus longer one to make it work as a cross body, making this an easy bag to carry
Large enough to fit even an NFL football, convenient for games to collect autographs
Seamless design prevents rips and has thick, durable plastic
cons: This bag has no inside pocket

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected - Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for game day! Purchased and used it for Pro football Hall Of Fame week in Canton and it worked well. You can even put a full size NFL ball inside for autographs or four smaller balls which I did. Strap is adjustable and even as a large man, it worked across body. I liked the zippered top feature which will help keep your stuff dry as it did when we had a slight rain the evening of the Enshrinement ceremony. No problems getting through game day security at the stadium. Had several people stop and ask where I purchased my bag. Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Toney Hill

customer_reviews.title: Won't be that durable, strong plastic smell, but if you need a stadium bag, I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Extremely strong plastic smell when taken out of the packaging; you really need this to air out for several hours before using, especially if you're going to put food inside. Minus one star. I'm also not sure it's that durable; the plastic / vinyl is thick enough, but the zippers and straps won't last under heavy use. Pros: But it's cheap, and the shoulder strap works, and it seems as good, if not better, than anything else I saw on Amazon for what it's designed to do
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Reiss-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Update: This bag lasted 6 work days. I came apart at a seam on the side. Very disappointed in this bag. Happy to say that Amazon once again stepped up and took it back as a return! I ordered this to use at work where we are required to comply with company security measures. The plastic appears to be durable and overall sturdy. I use if to bring 2 large water bottles and 3 to four sandwich sized containers. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Roomy Clear Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Love....Love....Love the bag!! It was exactly what I was needing! Very roomy and well made! Wish I had bought 2 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: DISPOSABLE BAG
customer_reviews.text: This bag couldn’t even go a season. The bottom stitching and branding started cracking and falling apart after fewer than a dozen uses. I only use it for home games to and from so it’s shouldnt be too much to expect it to get at least for a year. It looks good and I love the straps, it does fit the stadium rules for size but it doesn’t hold up to very little weight or use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Meets clear bag policy & perfect if you're traveling with kids!
customer_reviews.text: So I have two kids, which means my hands are going to be full especially going to the Seahawks Training Camp. I love the fact this bag has a strap, which helped me so much so I could still carry my youngest. It also has so much room! I literally packed my bag with 3 diapers, wipes, changing pad, 3 bananas, 3 water bottles, sunscreen, sanitizer, can of pringles, two cans of oreos, graham crackers, 3 pouches applesauce, my charger, and my wallet. Couldn't believe how much I could pack in this bag for 3 people. Definitely must by if you're heading out to a game and need to meet the clear bag policy. Would buy more just to have!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina Mae

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Great bag. Bought it to carry my bible and journal for Passion 2018 and it had enough room for my wallet, small makeup bag, AND my packable jacket. Thick plastic. Loved the crossbody option.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for a show at Fed Ex Field, to comply with the NFL bag policy for their stadiums. We were very happy with it! It arrived on time and as described. The vinyl feels durable and we had no issues bringing it into the stadium. The crossbody strap was a nice extra touch. I will definitely keep this for future events at NFL stadiums, and we are excited to use it for general travel needs as well!
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: At first was excited and liked the size of the purse
customer_reviews.text: At first was excited and liked the size of the purse, but after 2 weeks of use bottom of the purse ripped.
customer_reviews.author: jason stump

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Not necessarily an attractive bag but does the job you want. Within regulations (I was at a PGA tournament) and fits a lot. I had three smart water large bottles plus sunscreen and my wallet and it only took up like half the bag. And the cross strap makes it easy to tote. Very happy - exactly what I was looking for for the tournament.
customer_reviews.author: catatrine11

customer_reviews.title: Clear stadium Bag
customer_reviews.text: Received bags really quickly. They are perfect for new stadium clear bag and size rules. I like that they are messenger bags so you can have both hands free, my only wish is that the "carry" straps were not on it or at least could be detachable. When carrying as messenger bag, it is a bit cumbersome with all those straps. I like that this bag zips up at top.
customer_reviews.author: SKZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable tote
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag as a work tote. So far it is an excellent product. Easy to carry. Long shoulder straps and thick plastic. It did have a strong smell at first, so I aired it out outside for a few hours before putting my stuff in. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Super Nurse

customer_reviews.title: One game in---works fine
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy one of these for the first time this year---for college football games. New policy. This is roomy (NFL- and College-approved size) and held up 100% for our first game with it. Came with both (attached) over-the-shoulder and (removable) cross-body straps. I chose to clip on the strap from one of my purses (wider than the one provided) and I cut off the over-the-shoulder straps because I'll never use them. Worked just fine. I'll amend if it doesn't hold up for the next two games. Liked it that it came in several colors. I'll pass along product info to others.
customer_reviews.author: jatr224

customer_reviews.title: Zipper opening limits its usefulness!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell from the pictures that the zipper would be so small-- thus limiting it's usefulness to me. To send it back would mean I'd get $3 back. So I'm stuck with the useless thing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for an event that required a clear bag. I expected to use it that week and pack it away....but it's been great! I used it on vacation in June and several bag check people commented on how thankful they were for people who brought clear bags...plus saved me time finding my stuff too :) I've lugged it all over...and then just wiped it clean with some spray cleaner and paper towels. Plan to pack it for another vacation next week. Just came on to see if they sold a small backpack for my daughter to use! The only con....when the weather is hot, the plastic is hot to carry...
customer_reviews.author: kristen m

customer_reviews.title: Hated it
customer_reviews.text: This bag did not last! The straps broke the zipper broke!!
customer_reviews.author: Erlinda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: USE IT FOR BTS CONCERTS♡♡
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAG!! I used it for the BTS SPEAKYOURSELF Tour and mine was the perfect size. I had a change of clothes, 1 shirt I bought, banners, army bomb, little clutch for u know tampons, make up, my BTS meme fans, an apple, water bottle 3 raincoats, 2 fansite packages I bought deodorant and chargers/battery packs. I will buy this bag again cause I know imma wear it out! Thank you to whomever allowed this bag to be allowed at concerts and thank you for making it the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Gavi

customer_reviews.title: Handier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very convenient bag for more than just using as the approved bag type for stadium events. I did not purchase it for sports events, but that is one of the better applications. It has served me well for some of my temp jobs at conventions - I can carry a snack, a bottle of water, and anything else I might need during the shifts. The clear bag is an advantage for encountering door security, should I be on an afternoon shift. It's great for finding things. The strap and handles are well designed, and the zipper is a big plus. It's better than an open, button snap closure tote. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but very happy with purchase. Wanted one to keep in my car for the unexpected event that requires one. Very roomy. Will hold all my stuff plus my husbands plus have room. I wanted one that specifically had a detachable shoulder strap to use cross body Incase it wasn’t long enough I could use one of my own. No worries, very long adjustable strap. It is a $7 plastic bag. Not a designer leather tote. Keep that it mind when leaving feed back. It will do what I need it to do but I will also pack it accordingly. Looking forward to being prepared as more venues and events are going this route.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is really durable, I love the color and the extra body strap was really handy! I bought this so I could take my belongings with me into venues that have bag restrictions. We have a toddler so I purchased this as in the future I am sure I am going to need to pack things for her and it has PLENTY of space. Honesty I had to measure it because I was worried it was too big. I haven't had any trouble with the size (as it does measure exactly 12") but if that is something you might be worried about with a stricter venue I would recommend maybe the next size down from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, carries a lot, well made, straps need padding
customer_reviews.text: I use this lil' guy for concerts and festivals. It has so far been well within the allowable size for the stadiums/festivals I've attended. It's a good size to fit all my girly junk I insist I need but never end up using. I fit 1 bottle and 3 bags of wine, my wallet, a rolled up hoodie, my meds, snacky foods, and a phone. It was heavy but held up. Stitching is good. Plastic is soft but sturdy. The purse style shoulder straps are not comfortable at all on bare skin but do stay on your shoulder. Can be worn cross chest. More comfortable worn over a hoodie or shirt sleeve. Totally well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because Husky Stadium at the UW now has a clear-bag policy and I suspect other sports venues will soon follow suit. It works great. Generously sized, but still fits the 12'x12'x6" mandated. I was able to get all sorts of stuff in in there and just roll thru the security line. Like the shoulder handles but wish they were detachable If you use the cross-body handle, that is a lot of extra strap material. Good zipper, well-made. Noticed a lot of other people were carrying them as well. Beats the gallon-sized plastic bag any day! We will be using this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: Crossbody bag missing crossbody strap
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be crossbody bag..no crossbody strap included. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: shellymeansbusiness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as temporary bags for daycare so I and the teachers could easily see what was inside. Ended up purchasing more and taking them everywhere with us. Love the idea of clear bags, especially with two kids. We have one for each kid and I can quickly see which one belongs to which kid as well as what’s inside. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it worked out beautifully. It was true to size and held quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the Women's March, and it worked out beautifully. It was true to size and held quite a lot, crammed in, including a folded cane. It was much sturdier than I'd hoped for. The zipper worked easily. I will be able to use it on upcoming Marches.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Light-Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting off buying a clear bag but now the even the theatre wants them as well as sporting events. I got two bags for I expected to pay for one. Of course my initial concern was because they were so inexpensive what would the quality be - but my concerns were misplaced. The quality is MUCH better than I expected, just the right size for under the seats at the stadium and at the theatre. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb McBride

customer_reviews.title: Large bag. Perfect clear diaper bag for events.
customer_reviews.text: Finally used our bag to attend an NFL game. I am very happy with the bag! It is definitely large enough to be used as a diaper bag. I ended up with a lot of room leftover but then crammed my daughter’s jacket and teddy bear into it and everything fit perfect. The bag was easy to carry and super lightweight. I saw a few other moms with what appeared to be the same bag too. I would think this bag is too large to carry as a purse, but you could if you have a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Great bag--cross body strap was more than long enough to go over bulky clothing (didn't even adjust it all the way out.) I fit two 24oz water bottles, a poncho, snacks, mini-first aid kit, small bag of toiletries, gloves, and a spare cell phone charger in it with room to spare. Have only used it once so far, but it seems well built and durable--it held up to some pretty tough conditions on #womensmarchonwashington!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me to carry things for myself & family into stadiums with clear bag policies. Also, it's sturdy, but not heavy, which means quality materials. Definitely not flimsy & the stitching is great, believe me, I've put it to the test. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: lbeaz70

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice out of the package but the corner seam came away from the body after a few uses. Never put more that a few items in it so it wasn't overweight. It was inexpensive so I guess you get what you pay for - a disposable bag for a season or less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to take to a college stadium because my son was playing in the state championship football game there. I was pleasantly surprised by how sturdy this bag is. It also holds a lot of stuff. Since I'm the mom, I have to be prepared for all my family's needs. I was able to pack everything I needed to take with us. Getting through security was no problem. And, I didn't need to worry about my bag getting dirty. I plan on using this bag for all of our games next year.
customer_reviews.author: mslrod1502

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality & great price
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for work & I love it. It is the perfect size to fit all my stuff without being too obscenely big like most of my purses I use outside of work are lol Great durability. I use this every day and it's been a while now and beat it up pretty good at work with as much running around as I do and it getting knocked over and thrown around or dropped and so far it hasn't worn out at all & it can carry my pretty heavy metal water bottle too that quickly ripped through my old bag.
customer_reviews.author: Canary

customer_reviews.title: Make gettin through security easy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many reviews, but this one wa necessary. We bought two of these bags last minute for a sporting event. They are perfect. Easy for security to inspect, easy to find things inside, easy to keep clean, and sturdy. These is plenty of room for all the stuff you may need in the stands. These bags are now on my permanent packing list.
customer_reviews.author: Johnawc

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable sturdy bag for concerts or sport events (whenever they come back lol)
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for the BTS MOTS 7 tour that was postponed this year :-( . This is actually the first see though bag I've ever owned and I like it. The size fits perfectly with the stadium regulations and does the job. I put a magazine inside so you can see about how big it is in comparison. I've pulled on the handles and stuffed the bag to test it since I can't really use it at the moment, and it seems pretty sturdy and does its job. It fits plenty in it and can fit all of your necessities like portable chargers, fans, light sticks(if you have them), wallets, phone, etc. I'm very happy with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Finocchiaro

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be well make.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 5 because it looks like the description given and seems to be well made. We haven’t used them yet (3 weeks till our first game) and of course with any kind of acrylic/plastic, the proof is in the use. I will try to remember to update this post after the Super Bowl (when we have used it all season.) I am hoping for at least 3-4 seasons from these bags. Will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Mapper

customer_reviews.title: So glad I chose to get the cross-body strap
customer_reviews.text: Security didn't bat an eye at the size because the dimensions are perfect. The plastic is thick enough that it doesn't tear easily. The zipper spans the entire top so access is easy. I'm so glad I chose this bag with the cross-body length strap because hands free in a crowded stadium is always a good thing! I rated 3 of 5 stars for traveling because I would want a smaller zippered compartment if I were flying or taking a train- the bag is really roomy and I would want somewhere to tuck smaller items. For my purposes (metal concert and Drum Corps show) the bag has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyandi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but slightly smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different bags that were supposed to both be 12" wide. I liked this one better so this is the one I kept, even though it was about a half inch smaller than advertised (the other bag was exactly 12"). The double zipper is great and you can fit a lot of stuff in this to take to a game. I had rain ponchos, bottles of water and lots of other misc stuff in the bag and it was easy to access everything.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m a cosmetology student and I have been using this tote to carry my spray bottles and other water supplies. If anything leaks it’s contained 😉 I’ve used it every day for the past week and there are absolutely no signs of wear. I’m not putting a whole ton of weight in it and I don’t plan to. I’m sure it’ll eventually fall apart as this material typically does! For the price, it’s really good and I won’t mind having to replace it when the day comes. If you are only occasionally using this, it should last a really long time!
customer_reviews.author: Millie T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts
customer_reviews.text: I used this a couple times already to enter concerts and it is great! The handles are a nice size in that it has carry handles and also a long strap to put onto the shoulder (but won't work for me as a crossbody bag). It is a very generous size and fits everything I need including bottles water, snacks, and even my blanket and a small purse. Plus its really heavy and sturdy. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jo

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I attended a conference in a large arena. I ordered a two pack of the bags. When we got to the conference, the lines were extremely long to get in and most of the ladies had large bags or purses. Each one of them had to be opened and searched. When my daughter and I got to the front of the line, they saw our clear, stadium approved bag and we were waved right through. The bag was large enough to hold the extras we bought at the conference but still light to carry. It is also waterproof and stands up on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: bought this bag for 3 day festival called Aftershock. I am very surprised on how sturdy this bag is after being in 5 mosh pits, being stepped on by tons of people, spilled alcohol and who knows what else this bag didn’t rip! i was able to hold a lot of stuff in (4 shirts 2 water bottles 1 sweater 2 pairs of glasses 1 sunscreen ) without it being too full. overall i really like this bag and will definitely continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all reviews I was somewhat concerned about how long this bag would last. I decided to give it a try. I’m happy to say I was very pleased. I used this for a PGA event. I was able to put a lot of items in the bag without any problems( 2rain jackets, umbrella and a few other items) The adjustable strap was wonderful. I was able to wear it as a crossbody bag for the entire day. So glad I made this purchase. This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sport stadiums!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to see Taylor Swift at an arena. Of course the clear bag in this dimensions was required. They didn’t even blink at it and it was half full when I brought it in. Of course they looked through my stuff, but had no problems with the actual bag itself. I was worried it would seem small, but it perfectly held all of my stuff with extra room. You could put several shirts and a jacket it in and still have room. I bought this one because it had the big strap. It was a bit long, so I ended up using the handles, but you might enjoy the length of the big handle.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Garth Brooks Stadium Tour
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised on how much stuff this bag could hold. We had wallets, plastic water bottles, an extra pair of shoes (like Toms) and merch (shirts, hats, etc.) that we purchased at the concert. It is perfect for the Garth Brooks Stadium Tour and a fraction of what you will pay on site for a smaller sized ones. I can't wait to use it for this coming football season since they changed the rules and now we can only bring in clear plastic bags or small clutch wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Great for events that require clear bags!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to attend my first college sporting event and saw the 'clear bag policy' was in effect. I wanted something large enough that I would be able to fit everything in and at the same time something that seemed to get lots of good reviews. I did make a flat cardboard base so that my items had something to rest on, but other than that it was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for SWS (safe work spaces) that require clear bags on production floors. It is just as advertised, plastic with stitching. The strap hooks are plastic so know that if you're thinking of putting excessive weight in it.
customer_reviews.author: Zackary Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for venue shows
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was allowed at Rise Above Fest in Bangor this past weekend. No trouble getting through security. Came on time, held up nicely carrying water bottles and sweaters. Even had a bit of a candle flame mishap and the thick plastic didn't burn through, it held its shape! Next we'll be taking it to camp. While it's not waterproof, this looks like it would be perfect at the beach to keep cells, books and other things protected. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: You get exactly what’s listed
customer_reviews.text: You get what you see. The bag is exactly the dimension listed (12x12x6) and absolutely perfect if you’re taking it to a stadium concert where they have a strict policy about clear bags. It comes with an extra strap Incase you want to hang it from your shoulder/strap it across your chest. It’s great for throwing stuff in there and could probably fit a good amount of stuff. Very lightweight and rainproof! No pockets, obviously. Just an overall neat bag that gives you exactly what you paid for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Al

customer_reviews.title: Good weight plastic
customer_reviews.text: The bag was bigger than I thought it would be. Bought for spring league baseball games, which ended up having most of them cancelled. I will use again next season or for other sporting events. For outside events this is a good size as it will hold a bottle of water. For other events, its too big so make sure you order the correct size for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Watts

customer_reviews.title: Best clear bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Its a perfect fit for places (stadiums, museums) that only allow certain measurment clear bags. It has 2 different handles for a shoulder bag or a handheld. I would reccomend to all of my friends. The straps are sturdy and can handle a little weight. I can't see anyone using this bag too regularly so it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Gary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor concert season.  All venues now requiring this type of pack or bag.
customer_reviews.text: Size met parameters for venues and transparency for safety checks. shoulder strap was long enough to use as cross body. I packed a blanket and rain jacket plus misc items. plenty of room. clear, durable and sturdy plastic was conveniently water resistant. Rain droplets fell off. i didn't test for water resistance, but unlikely due to seams. purchase of two worked well for friends.
customer_reviews.author: susan ct

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These bags are just the things I need. I have a shortage of storage space (who doesn't?!) and I like to put things in clear cases so that I can readily see what's inside! It keeps all my stuff in order and it looks really neat, too! These are of excellent quality. They should last as long as I do!! ;-) I think I got a very good value for my money. I appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: BP G.

customer_reviews.title: :( I really liked it but it ripped fast.
customer_reviews.text: So my 1st review was great when I received this item. My childs school requires bags/purses to be clear. However I'm updating my review. After only 2 weeks of light use it has already ripped. I'm very disappointed because when we bought it we thought it was going to be perfect for what she needed. All she was carrying in it was a small wallet, school ID, a house key and her cell phone so it wasn't really holding much weight or any sharp objects.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Description
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very sturdy, and was acceptable for use at our local MLS stadium. I go to sporting events frequently, and this size of bag seems to be the standard size for all the venues I visit. Having a clear bag also made it a lot easier to find what we needed (obviously), so there are several positive points to it. The red color I ordered is exactly like it is in the picture. Be sure to always check the venue's rules on what can be brought in, but this bag should get you in to pretty much any venue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Theisen

customer_reviews.title: Do not last a year with every day use.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a prison and purchased this bag to keep my lunch in. It helps me to get through safety at work because it is see through. It fits on the top shelf of the fridge in the up right position. It cracks after being in freezings temperatures. Or left in the car in a North Eastern winter. It does have a strong plastic smell at first. I got it in pink. I work more than 8 hours a lot, it is a little big for one lunch. Not happy with the last two bags I got both not sewn well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used to go to a Detroit Lions game. Got through security without any hassles or problems. Only complaint is the guys I was with started dumping all of their stuff into it - LOL! Great bag for the game and it held up surprisingly well. It's now in a closet waiting for the next time I need a clear bag. I would buy this bag again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stadium or any venue where you can't take your handbag.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and I needed it to attend the Miramar Air Show - very restrictive security so this was exactly what I needed. Had a lot of folks ask where I got it and they couldn't believe the price. Highly recommend it to anyone attending any kind of venue where your handbag or backpack is not permitted. It's a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cher in Oceanside

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a retailer that requires us to carry clear bags and provides a fairly small and unattractive one without a shoulder strap. I searched and finally decided on this one and love it! It is large enough to carry everything I need and is sturdy. I took off the shoulder strap since the handles are plenty long enough to use over my shoulder. To give it a little character, I bought a couple vinyl car window stickers to put on it. I love it! It is personalized to me and didn’t break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: StewBabyQ

customer_reviews.title: this thing is way TOO small...hardly holds anything.
customer_reviews.text: WAY TOO SMALL. bought for beach only holds two towels rolled up and barely anything else. very disappointed and when I went to return I only was offered 4 dollars. I thought PRIME meant free returns. Thinking of giving up AMAZON prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Auler

customer_reviews.title: Too large for Prison volunteers
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great big BUT it is too large for taking into the Texas state prisons. I ordered it because I volunteer at the Prisons and need a new bag but it must be a 1 gallon size bag. This is oversized and would not make it through security.
customer_reviews.author: nellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mercedes bens stadium in Atlanta
customer_reviews.text: I put my credit cards, ID, and cash in a small pouch inside the clear bag so they weren’t viewable in the clear bag. Security searched pouch, but let me on through. Much better than a tiny pouch that isn’t clear. Wouldn’t be a problem if I didn’t need to bring an inhaler with me. Big enough to carry my 2 friends stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fit the stadium requirements.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to attend several sporting events on LSU campus. I wanted a larger bag than the popular envelope-style clear crossbody bags since I knew I’d need extra space for my kids’ items. This bag was comfortable, light, and spacious for what I needed. I added a monogram using adhesive vinyl to personalize it. I saw many others with the same bag. The zipper top does not open very wide, but it was fine for limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Football is serious business and so is this bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I cram this sucker full every Friday night. It's Friday Night Lights here in Texas y'all and we take our highschool football seriously. This has been the rainiest season in quite sometime and I have managed to cram water bottles 2 big rain suits, wallets, glasses, a towel and they absolute must have large and small cowbells in to this bad boy and the seams have not been compromised. They held together perfectly. I intended to seam seal those stitches, but apparently it is not necessary. Even sitting out in torrential downpours everything inside remained dry!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fit comfortably on my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for going to an NFL game. Was able to fit a small blanket, small umbrella and six water bottles. Fit comfortably on my shoulder. Would have liked a smaller pocket for my cellphone and wallet but it worked great. Was a bit rainy but everything was dry inside.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good for entry into stadiums and other venues venues with “clear bag” rules
customer_reviews.text: Just received this bag a few days ago. It seems to be made quite sturdily, but as I haven’t had the need/opportunity to use it yet, I can’t attest to its durability. I believe it will work quite well for the venues that require clear bags for entry into the events. The price is certainly right, and I believe it will meet my needs for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: abcsquared

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using my clear bags for knitting bags. It's so nice to be able to see where everything is, right down to the darning needles and tiny markers. The smell of these bags was really strong, but thankfully wore off after 5 days or so of airing out. So far, the bags are holding up well and seem to be strong enough for my purpose. It's okay to carry a couple of hardcover books, a water bottle and an iPad, but I wouldn't put in too much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag for sporting events to save time
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits the regulations for all security checkpoints at major sporting events and saved me so much time this year. I had a D1 football player and I could carry all my game day stuff in this bag without any problems. I used it for a BIG10 game in Minnesota and at Westpoint (Army), Cincinnati at Paul Brown Stadium and will use it next year at a PGA event. You can carry a small blanket, phone charging cords, your wallet, makeup and hand warmers in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Not Allowed In Stadium
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine however it was not allowed in the stadium. Was thrown away after one day so a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stadium Bag
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag to attend a college football game. Very sturdy and sized right with plenty of room for what we needed to bring in. The long straps made it easy to put on your shoulder which I liked though my husband preferred the cross-body strap. Really liked the zip top so we didn't have to worry about anything falling out. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith S.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - perfect for NFL games
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a decal sticker separately and placed it on the purse. Brought the purse to one game so far and it held up very well. I was able to pack a fleece blanket, my wallet, phone, hat/headband and keys, and still had plenty of room for other items if needed. It was comfortable to carry and I liked the cross-body strap feature. I'd recommend this bag for sporting events, but I'm unable to comment on durability with everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Gcilis

customer_reviews.title: Great  value
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t purchase it Bc I wanted it, purchased Bc the stadiums and events required a clear bag. That said, I like that the straps allow you to wear it like a cross body or over the shoulder. Picked maroon so I could easily pick my bag out of a line up of clear and black straps. Doesn’t seem like it would hold for everyday or super heavy wear but for games it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great value and just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to use for the baseball stadium in my city. They recently instituted new bag size restrictions and prohibited other types of bags including back packs. This Bagail bag meets my needs and is within the restrictions. I'm grateful to have it and will buy from this brand again if I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rickard Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you only need to use this once in a while, it'll do the trick. I got it for an outdoor festival and had plenty of room in it for battery chargers, sunblock, an umbrella, a few snacks and my wallet. I don't feel like it would stand up to every day use, but its good enough for the concert/festival purposes.
customer_reviews.author: FMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We used these this past weekend for the first time, and they worked great. The military security guard told us that he really appreciates when people use the clear bags, because he just has to turn them around to check all sides, rather than digging through them. The zippered top keeps items secure. I like that it has a zipper pull on each side of the bag. I also like the detachable shoulder strap. My husband in particular appreciated that, as he didn't want to carry a "purse". Two bags for the price was an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P

customer_reviews.title: Works, but is messy
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for a concert. It is the correct size and everything. The plastic is sturdy and it held quite a lot for me. The black straps shed a bunch of specks all over everything I had. I couldn’t figure out what it was at first, thought I’d gotten dirty somehow. By the end of the show and my walking the straps on my shoulder seemed to be just flaking away. I could brush little black plastic particles off it. I wound up throwing it away after the show.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Noxious Odor
customer_reviews.text: We needed this bag to go to a college graduation, and the arena had a ‘clear bag policy’. It’s exactly the right size, and it’s deceptively large. We put diapers and wipes in it, an epi-pen, and my child’s blanket, but we could’ve fit way more stuff in there. I deducted One Star only because the odor of the bag right out of the package was AWFUL. It made me nauseous and cough. I ended up putting the bag outside until shortly before we needed to use it. The odor is completely gone now, but beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amē

customer_reviews.title: ... going into college football stadiums and it has worked great! It is a great size and comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for going into college football stadiums and it has worked great! It is a great size and comes with two different kinds of straps. I love that it zips so that all items are secure. The only thing I wish it had was a zippered pocket or something inside for keeping my license and money separate and easy to grab. For the price, this is an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but does have bad chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: As other mentioned, it has an absolutely horrible chemical smell. I aired it out for days and it still smelled. Tried washing it - still smelled terrible. I finally put Carpet Fresh for pet odors in it, shook it up good so it covered every spot and left it alone for a couple of days. Once I washed it out, it was much better and, although it had a bit of an odor, it was OK to use. It is very sturdy and, aside from the smell, I highly recommend it. It holds more than you'd think, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsfielder

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months with off-label daily use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for arena events, but ended up using as my daily purse. Under that use case, it lasted 4 months before the top plastic started cracking from wear and tear, and 5 months before I noticed my keys poking through a stress-point hole in the bottom, at which point I bought a new one. I'll register with the warranty this time and see what happens in another 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: No shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a shoulder strap, as pictured with the product. The handles fit over my shoulder but I would have liked a shoulder strap. This bag is the same size as the bag I bought at the University of Arizona, which is the specific size allowed to bring into the sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like these clear bags. There are times when they come in handy. I use them for the beach or when I travel. Their great for football, baseball & basketball games (their stadium approved), you get the idea! This bag is well made and has just the right amount of room. I won't hesitate to order again!
customer_reviews.author: SunRae

customer_reviews.title: It would have been great to use
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these carriers works as advertised. We bought them in anticipation of attending a tennis tournament where such see-through items are mandatory. Regretfully corona-19 put an end to the tournament and our immediate need for the carry-ons. We look forward to a time when they are once again required.
customer_reviews.author: J. Will

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bags and the two-for deal is totally cost effective. We used them last weekend for a Fan Fest event. We completely loaded one up with our kiddo’s stuff and it held it all, and then some. The plastic smell is a bit strong at first but it’ll air out. Plastic material is thick. Nylon straps and zippers are sturdy. Cross body strap is a bonus to keep hands free. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used it today when I went to a game and it worked out great. The zippers opened/closed smoothly and the clear plastic is pretty heavy duty. I like the fact that I have the flexibility of using the shoulder strap vs. the hand straps only. It actually holds a lot. I would recommend buying this again for sporting events. I wouldn't recommend this for travel though as it could break if tugged and pulled a lot during travel.
customer_reviews.author: PandaLover

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if there was a separate pocket for keys and ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag to go to a PGA event. Bag was much bigger than expected, so can put a lot of stuff and shoulder strap allows to carry as cross body bag. Would be better if there was a separate pocket for keys and other small items, but can't complain for $6! There is a strong plastic smell when you open it. I gues that will go away in time.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bags!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bags. Purchased to use at Monster Jam event which was held at our local stadium. Well made, thick plastic, and sturdy handles. Purchased one pink and one navy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper123

customer_reviews.title: Now I can find my stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Liking the size. Wish it had a solid bottom. I put a piece of cardboard in the bottom for strength and to keep stuff from crunching in the middle. I got it for a trip but I see so many other uses as if you don’t see it you can’t find it. I will probably be purchasing more of these as they are just so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Rene

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a must for outdoor events
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Heavy plastic,large compartment,double sided zipper with the option to be hand held,or across body. Took it to an outdoor event and held...sunscreen (full size),wallet,6+ iphone,gum,mints,asthma inhaler,80 count baby wipes,sunglasses,3umbrellas....then there was still room for large program and two more canvas bags! This is an amazing purchase to take to events especially if bags are checked before entry! Love it
customer_reviews.author: RainNJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stadium
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a stadium event. Crossbody strap is detachable and adjustable, and the attached straps are pretty long too, so no matter how you like to carry a bag, they've got you covered. LOVE the top zipper -- especially that it's a dual zipper you can open from either the end or the middle, which is not common on cheap bags but is a really handy feature.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Beck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the bag was more than big enough to fit our needs. I was able to pack 6 waterbottles, wallet, phone, stadium towels, and a small vanity pouch inside without crushing and could have fit more. I liked the 2 lengths of straps for carrying. While I've only used it for one game-day so far, it looks sturdy - the stitching is even and it's well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Schoenleber

customer_reviews.title: Good little stadium bag
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is not as substantial as the clear plastic backpack that I ordered, but worked well as a handy "man bag" for a friend of mine. The plastic is softer but holds its own and by no means flimsy. Can stuff it with a jacket and it'll hold a water bottle easily. Its just a softer, thinner plastic, but it still works as a good stadium carryall.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Loon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took it to a concert at Soldier Field in Chicago and it was perfect! It’s sturdier than it looks and it carries so much! I fit in our phones, chargers, drinks, souvenirs, and even 2 sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalina Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I work in a correctional facility, and we are required to use clear everything. This bag works really well for bringing my lunch, and any other needed items to work each day. The zippers are good, the vinyl is thick enough that it isn't flimsy, and the straps are held on well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Mess on packaging
customer_reviews.text: Bag is fine. Will be using it as an Easter basket for a college student. Packaging had sticky mess on it. Mess leaked inside and got on the bag. Didn't have time to deal with returning and replacing. Washed it off. Don't know how no one noticed the mess when putting it in the box to ship. Sticky and nasty. Minus 2 stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but smells like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this bag smells so strongly. I bought this bag to take to an out-of-state game and packed it with some boxed food and canned drinks just for the 4 hour car ride to where we were staying... Everything smelled (and still smells!) like plastic. It worked great for the game, but of course my wallet and camera still have a slightly funky odor to them. I'm hoping this goes away soon because other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect-Sized Bag With Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: We are using these bags to store car blankets in our trunk, keeping them clean, dry, organized, and ready for use on long road trips, while camping, or when stranded on the side of the road during inclement weather. They allow us to see what is stored inside and the large zipper opening makes it easy to get bulky items in and out. The carry handles and straps make carrying a breeze. Thick plastic and sturdy construction, especially around the zippers and strap attachment points will ensure a long, useful life. Arrived on time and appropriately packed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to any college football game anytime soon or in the future, you'll need a clear bag per their new policies for safety. This one fulfills all of their requirements and is the largest size personal bag you're allowed to take into a stadium. The construction is solid and it's comfortable to carry around. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: A little bulky, but worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a BTS concert, and it worked perfectly! It is a little bulky if you have a lot of products inside, but otherwise, it’s worth the money! Shoulder strap is nice to have!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kussatz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those football games & security checks!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet but closely examined the construction, the zipper & handles are the usual you would expect. All appear to be of good quality. Never knew I would need such an item, but in today's world it makes getting though security (not speaking for TSA) at events a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: N J in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sporting events!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because I go to a lot of sporting events and clear bags are now required for anything larger than a 6x12 clutch at several Seattle locations. I haven't used it yet, but I love the fact that it has a zipper and cross body strap. Its also a good size, large enough to hold the basics as well as a jacket or blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: BAGAIL NFL and PGA Stadium Approved Clear Tote Bag with Zipper Closure Crossbody Messenger Shoulder Bag with Adjustable Strap
feature_bullets: STADIUM APPROVED- Bagail Clear bags meets NFL and PGA Tournament guidelines. Approved to be used where regulations require clear bags such as NFL football games, casinos, events, parks, and college stadiums.

FASHIONABLE & FUNCTIONAL - Our design with a top zipper and canvas style flap looks great across your body while you carry your belongings. Just because your bag needs to be transparent doesn't mean it shouldn't be seen.

QUALITY MADE - It is made of from 0.4mm thick vinyl. It is thick enough to feel strong and durable, but not so thick that it feels stiff and rigid. The nylon handles are reinforced and each one is double stitched so you can comfortably carry a heavy load.

PERFECT SIZE- It measures 12 inches wide by 12 inches high by 6 inches deep—big enough to hold a digital camera, suntan lotion, a water bottle, program, wallet, keys, cell phone, hat, sunglasses, and more, all at once. 30-60 inch adjustable strap allows for comfortable over the shoulder carrying.
Offering you the best products and serving all your needs has always been our top goal. This is why we offer you a full refund in case this clear stadium security bag does not meet all your demands.
